name: La bolita loca
description:
In this game you must move the small ball to the door at the end of the way.

It"s seems easy, but believe me, you will need time to succeed ! Try to do it whitout pause the game, but if you need some help, you may press the "p" button (letter) and when you are ready to start again, just, move free, up, down, left or right.

To move you will use the arrow buttons, up, down, left or right.

Enjoy it!
